document_data.name: Amanther
document_data.mainbody: '''Amanther''' was an [[Avowed]] of [[Candlekeep]] in the late mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: In a group comprised of him, [[Larth]] and three others, he was the oldest and tallest.{{cite book/Elminster's Daughter/MMP|194|12}}
document_data.Abilities: He was trained in the ability to perceive the nature of a spell before it was cast, through observing the verbal, somatic, and material components required of it. He also was somehow able to see through spell-guises without anyone noticing.
document_data.History: Amanther was one of the monks who welcomed Roablar of [[Lantan]], actually [[Noumea Cardellith]], into Candlekeep at some point after the early spring of {{yearlink|1373}}. He was able to see through her spell-guise immediately, though he admitted it was a good one.
